column2: Greetings spacefaring being!
Greetings to you too
I don't want to talk to you
I hope you will enjoy our peaceful planet
Can you tell me a little bit about it?
Can you tell me about your kind?
I am certain I will. Good bye
Of course. The climate is mild, and there are no predators that are dangerous to us. There is enough edible vegetation to nourish our entire population without the need for additional farming.
Sounds too good to be true
I would like to talk about something else
It has been nice talking to you. Goodbye
What would you like to know?
Tell me about your technology
Tell me about your biology
Tell me about your philosophy
Did you ever have contact with other civilisations?
I think I'll explore a little more. See you later
Actually it wasn't always this way, but we have been able to adjust certain parameters
I see
We have abandoned technology, and now live in harmony with nature
I see
We have found that most other lifeforms live a lot shorter than we do. We do not know why.
I see
Do you wish to discuss the teachings of gzrollazasd?
Another time perhaps
Indeed, 1300 cycles ago, a species very similiar to yours visited our planet. They were suffering from a lack of legs, just like you.
What else can you tell me about them?
I see
They were very friendly, and helped us to adjust this planet. They were in a kind of war at the time.
Can you tell me more about those 'adjustments'?
Can you tell me more about that war?
I see
Sorry, no. They never went into detail, and we do not care for that sort of things.
I see
They are a secret, sorry.
I see
